name: POTOMAC PARTNERS DC (ON BEHALF OF ORANGE COUNTY, CA)
description: Potomac Partners DC: Federal government affairs; Orange County, CA: local government
sampleDescriptions: Monitor legislative and regulatory changes to welfare policy

Monitor legislation and regulation relating to public and federally subsidized housing
Monitor issues relating to sober living facilities
Monitor impact of health care reform on county governments, specifically H.R. 1628, American Health Care Act of 2017.
Monitor regulations and legislation changing Medicare and Medicaid policies
Monitor FY18 budget and appropriations legislation
